29 January 2024
The new child clinic in the South Square in Kimrah cannot be reached
Photo: Kimra Info


The residents of Kimre complain that a new, recently opened child clinic No. 2 in the South (Based Area) area cannot be moved because of the untreated road.

" There are virtually no roads. " It is very difficult to move and park on low-distance vehicles, the car is buried and the knitting is reported by the subsidiaries of the city. - The snow pot in town makes traps and pedestrians and motorists every year! Nobody cared about it before. I don't think so.

Source:Tver24.com

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

29 January 2024
In the Tver region, the deceased student of the Kimr College is mourned

In KIMrah Tver oblast, Artem Kolbasnikov, a third-grader student, was killed and was trained at a local college in a cooker. This was reported in the Kimra Westnik, as well as confirmed by the educational institution.

Artem Aleksandrovich, born in 2005, who attended the thirty-second group.

" He was in a hurry to live, to love, to enjoy life, despite everything " .

Colbasnikov is told that he was an active young man, was involved in creative activities not only in college, but also in cities, including sports and volunteers.

Praying with Artem took place in the Church of Ascension of the Lord (Christmas) and buried a young man in a local town near his mother.

The circumstances of the student ' s death are not drowning. The locals remember a guy with goodness, mourning, "We'll miss you very much. You will remain in our hearts forever.”

Source:AIF Tweet

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

28 January 2024
A 9-year-old girl was injured in an accident in the Kimra district
Photo: Kimra City State Inspectorate


On 26 January, 2024 at 15:45, an accident occurred at an unregulated intersection of unregulated intersections of uneven roads in the Radzhkaya-Sevchenko city of Kimra Tver province.

The 59-year-old driver, driving the Toyota Auris vehicle on the secondary road, failed to comply with the requirement to give way to the Toyota Camri vehicle under the control of the 36-year-old driver driving the main road, which resulted in a collision of the vehicles.

As a result of the accident, a 9-year-old girl of Toyota Auris car, who was not fastened with a safety-belt, was injured.

The Kimra State Inspectorate calls on drivers not to risk the lives and health of children! Even if you're going to a kindergarten, school, store or next door, a child in a car should always be in a special restraint and be fastened by a safety-belt!

Kimra City State Inspectorate

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

25 January 2024
In the Kimra district, an artist and pedagogue, Nikolai Spiridonovic Panov, died.
Photo: Centre of Arts


On 24 January, in the 92nd year of life, the heart of a good, bright, wise man, a distinguished pedagogy, a talented artist, a member of the People ' s Club of Artists and Masters of the Decorative and Applied Arts, the Sozizé, Nikolay Spiridonovic Panova.

Nikolai Spyridonovich lived a long, interesting, dignified life. But with the thought of leaving our good friend, our hearts are filled with deep sadness. Together with Nikolai Spiridonovich Panov, the eternity of the age of corifes, founding fathers of the Kimra school of paintings is unreturned.

And while Nikolai Spyridonovich wasn't a birthmark, he fell in love with our painting edge, his little homeland, the town of the White Town with all his big heart, and dedicated himself to serving her.

It was Nikolai Spiridonovic who founded in 1989 the Arts School, where he raised, gave wings, opened the way to the world of art for many generations of talented children, for whom he will remain the teacher forever, the Master.

Dear, esteemed Nikolai Spiridonović, we are grateful for the fate she gave us a meeting with you. You will remain in our memory forever, in our hearts. We express our deepest condolences to Marina Nikolayevne ' s daughter and to the entire family, Nikolai Spyridonovic. We share your grief and grieve with you.

Collected by the Centre for Arts, Artists and Master of the People ' s Association Club

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

25 January 2024
Two residents of the Kimre District cut trees per million roubles
Photo: piqsels.com


They were convicted of illegal logging of trees on collusion in the Kimra district. The details of the case were shared with the Public Prosecution Service.

In November 2022, two men were illegally drinking 47 forest trees and berez. By their actions, they caused 1.2 million roubles of damage to the Regional Ministry of Forestry.

The court sentenced the perpetrators to three years ' imprisonment with a probationary period of two years each. The contract has not entered into force.

Source:True

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

24 January 2024
In the Kimre Court, criminal proceedings will be considered on the death row in 2023 м Video

On 11 January 2024, a criminal case was brought before the Kimra City Court with an indictment of article 264 of the Criminal Code against a resident of Rostov province.

According to the indictment phase 24.07.2023, between 0900 hours and 09:08 hours, the driver, driving the 2824DK vehicle, was moving along the 73 km of the Tver-Christen-Mi-Ilinsky road, from the control of the vehicle, losing control of its movement and moving in the direction of the carriageway.Did a clash.with AWAZ 21041-20.

As a result of the accident, the VAZ driver was injured and died at the scene of the accident, while the minor passenger " 2824DK " , who was not fastened by the safety-belt, sustained injuries that caused serious health damage.

Press Service of the Kimre City Court of the Twer Region

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

24 January 2024
The Kimra City State Inspectorate is looking for eyewitnesses on Gagharin Street.

Between 21.12.2023 and 22.12.2023, near D.7, a vehicle parked at Lada Grant Grant, an unidentified driver, driving an unidentified vehicle (presumably blue or blue) was transported to a parked vehicle, after which he left the scene.

If you have any relevant information on the above-mentioned facts of the accident, please request you to hand it over to the telephones of the duty station of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, “Kimrski”: 8(48236) 2-11-32 and 3-12-02.

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

23 January 2024
In the Kimra district, the fourth week is searched for the missing Elena Bilienko.

Kimrah is searching for a 59-year-oldElena Bilienko♪ The woman disappeared on January 4th.

According to Sova, a woman left the house at Kimra's address, Chapaev, home 10, and disappeared.

Elena Bilienko's height is 160-165 cm, medium bodywork, hair wavelength cashtanes combined, brown eyes.

The missing is wearing a blue coat, red cough, black trousers and beards.

Special features: scars on your wrist.

All those who have information about the missing are requested to report by telephone: 8-910-646-34-34, 8-904-014-12-34 or 112.

Source:True

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

22 January 2024
Kimra Medwejata won the regional phase of the Golden Shayba
Photo: tverisport. ru


On 20 January, in Kimrah, the regional phase of the All-Russian Young Hokkei Young Hokkeists ' Allegations was held up to 11 (2013-2014 birth). On the ice stage, the Arctic Sports Team, tournament awards and the final stage of the competitions, three teams, White Medvedi (Kimra), Rous Medvedi (Konakovo) and Volna (Kalazin).

Games have been rounded up. The local " medweja " , which have played rivals with a total account of 21:4. The owners slaughtered the Kaljazin peers at 13:1 and the Konakova hockeists played 8:3.

The gold medals were owned by Dmitri Kudrashov, Alexandre Matsov, All Vololod Circles, Daniel Shuragin, Stepan Gorokov, Kirill Quurnkov, Vladislav Sizh, Evgen Garanin, Zahar Nikonov, Semen Voronin, Alexander Sozikov, Xenya Antonov, Nikita Filipkov, St.

In the second place, the regional tournament completed the Russian Bear team, which, with a dry account of 7.0, won the Kalasin Volnu.

Ulyana Tuchkin

Source:Tverisport.ru

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

21 January 2024
In the battle zone, the death of a resident of Kimra Mihail Vernik

On 18 January 2024, in the war zone, in the direction of Artomov, a soldier from Kimpah, Vernik Mikhail, was killed in the performance of military duty. He was 37.

Mikhail attended Gimnazia No. 2, graduated from SPEK and MIRAE, was involved in many urban activities.

Dear memory to our brother, son, husband, father and friend.

The eternal memory of our hero!

The proclamation will take place in Lobnia, and the transfer/autobus will be organized from Kimp.

In the coming days, information will be available on the place/date/time of goodbye.

Wishers to forgive Mikhail, please contact the post.

) VK / WhatsApp/ telegrams: Vernik Alina (8-980-641-45-96)

Alina Vernik

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

21 January 2024
In Kimrah, school No. 11 held a mourning rally in memory of the SVR member killed.
Photo: MoU Middle School No. 11


On Friday, 19 January, a mourning rally in memory of Lulin Sergei was held in the Kimrah of Tver province.

On Saturday afternoon, at school No. 11, where a man went to school, his loved ones gathered, staff members and students of the budget. After the morning speech, a memorial board was opened in memory of Sergei.

According to the Vontact School Group, a man died in Ukraine during his military duty.

Source:IC in Toweri

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

21 January 2024
In the Kimra district, people are afraid to leave the house because of a pack of dogs е Video
Photo: Squirtsov's hope


A resident of Kimre Twer province told me about dogs who walk freely in the yard and frighten people.

♪ There's a pack of dogs in Lotkov's front of House No. 4. Scared to get out of the house, she wrote a woman in a local VC group.

Animal theme is one of the most vibrant in our society, causing people to feel emotionally different. For example, one of those who's in the middle of a debate, whether it's a joke or serious, is suggesting feeding hungry animals, and her Internet visas are put to sleep. One of the commentators was a woman claiming that a pack of dogs had recently attacked her and a child near child garden No. 25.

Remind me that on 18 January, a seven-year-old girl was attacked and bitten in Nelidovo. On this point, the head of the Russian Criminal Code has received a criminal case.

Source:IC in Toweri

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

20 January 2024
Ice thickness data in the Kimra district as at 20 January 2024

The General Directorate of the Russian Federation ' s Ministry of Foreign Affairs in the area of Tver recommends that citizens take their own safety more responsibly and do not go to the thin ice.

Respect the rules of safety on the ice!

If a man fails under the ice, don't be silent, call for help and help yourself!

A child in cold water in 15-20 minutes loses consciousness and can die.

If the victim is conscious (light form of hypothermia), he must be changed to dry clothes and be given hot and sweet drinks.

If the victim is unconscious (heavy form of hypothermia), it is necessary:

  • Place it in the heat room;

  • To change clothes on dry, try not to disturb the victim;

  • Put the victim on a solid level face upwards;

  • If necessary, make artificial breathing;

  • warming up the victim by putting his head, neck, chest and abdomen pre-emptively in hot water (70 C) or heating the injured body with a tight clutch (both stained in the blanket).

It is prohibited to give the victim alcohol, massage or vegetate it, place the victim in hot water or warm limbs.

After the delivery of care to the victim, it is urgent that he/she be brought to the nearest hospital.

In the event of an emergency, call UNION SERVICE by telephone " 01 " (with cell phones 101).

Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

20 January 2024
In the Creation Night, Chief Kimr checked the swimming and rescued victims in the Video accident.
video footage from the Kimre MoD press service


In the Kimra Municipal District, the Krezyn baths in Jordan were held near the Kimr Temple of Ascension, the Jerusalem Icon Temple of the Mother in the White City, and the Temple of the Smole Icon of God ' s Mother in the village of Ilinsk. In each location, the staff of the MES and ambulances, as well as representatives of the Kimre Municipal District Administration, were on duty.

Andrei Nikolayevich Lukjanov, head of the Kimr municipal district, came personally to check the way the White Town baths are under way, is everything okay? The Minister of Culture of the Tver Region of Xenya Olegovna Lavrov-Glinka was also present. Coupling took place, in a domestic atmosphere, without cable and fuss. The parishes were able to dress quickly for those who fell asleep, and the attending doctor made recommendations on how not to get cold after swimming.

The head witnessed the consequences of the accident, the light car flew into the skirts and practically plunged into the snow on the rim. Fortunately, there were no casualties, but the car was tied up in the snow, and DPS officers tried to get her out. Andrei Nikolayewicz helped the victims, and the vehicle was able to be released and towed rapidly.

Because of the delay on the road, to the Ascension Temple in Kimrah, the Head arrived later than planned, and there was no one near Jordan. The duty report said it went well.

It is worth noting that, this night, the people of the Kimre District were lucky to have weather: despite the fact that a real snow buran took place tonight, it was already quiet, bleak and not even cold. At 1:00 A.M., ascension's temple opened up wonderful species for the night of Kimra. Those who took part in the swimsuit and those who watched nothing happen by congratulating each other on the holiday went home. And only urban workers continued to work to clear the streets of snowmowers from the effects of the evening burane.

KIMRA MO Press Service

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.

19 January 2024
A special military operation exhibit opened in Kimrah.
Photo: Government of the Tver Region


On 18 January, an exhibition entitled " Svoi " (0+) was opened at the Kimra Krai Museum. More than 40 artists from different parts of the Russian Federation participated in the exhibition. The masters presented portraits of the land and family members of the special military operation.

Many children ' s parents were a guest of honour for the opening of the exhibition: Vadim Longevus with the wife of Eugenia. Their portrait was also part of the exhibit.

The exhibition can see the thematic paintings and excavations of Denis Gavrileiko, the scenes of the native defences of the Rodine, created by Sergei Kurbatov, an aquarelist, and by Alexander Kozlov, a rector artist.

The Quadriptich of a well-deserved Russian artist, Victor Chiki, has a special place on the fate of the deceased soldier.

Children ' s Arts Schools Nos. 1 and No. 2 of the Kimra District provided five jobs at the exhibition.

In addition to portraits and landscapes, visitors to the museum can meet the poet poets of Sergei Lobanova and Paula Shabrine. The thematic drawings of the artist Maria Zikolina accompany poetry by various authors.

The exhibition is open at the Kimra Kraevitch Museum on 16 February 2024. The exhibition will then be presented in Tule, Kursk, Omsk and Moscow. The project is run by the Babel Art Production Centre.

Government of the Twer Region

Be aware! Sign on.Telegram-canalGrod-Kimra.ru.
